tests.test_input:
version:                                                                             2
updates:
  - package-ecosystem:                    "cargo"
    directory:  "/"
    schedule:
      interval:     "monthly"
    assignees:
      -     "hougesen"
    open-pull-requests-limit:       25

  - package-ecosystem:                              "github-actions"
    directory:          "/"
    schedule:
        interval:          "monthly"
    assignees:
        - "hougesen"
    open-pull-requests-limit: 25
tests.test_output:
version: 2
updates:
  - package-ecosystem: "cargo"
    directory: "/"
    schedule:
      interval: "monthly"
    assignees:
      - "hougesen"
    open-pull-requests-limit: 25
  - package-ecosystem: "github-actions"
    directory: "/"
    schedule:
      interval: "monthly"
    assignees:
      - "hougesen"
    open-pull-requests-limit: 25

description: An extensible command line tool or library to format yaml files
